original_text: If thou wert pure and upright; surely now he would awake for thee, and make the habitation of thy righteousness prosperous.
korean_text: 또 청결하고 정직하면 반드시 너를 돌보시고 네 의로운 처소를 평안하게 하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: If thou wert pure and upright
surely now he would awake for thee
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 그는 지금 너를 위해 깨어날 것이며

sentences.original_text: and make the habitation of thy righteousness prosperous
sentences.korean_translation: 네 의로움의 거처를 번영하게 만들 것이다
